definition: tiller (stem at the base of grass plants)

to divide/to separate/to distribute/to allocate/to distinguish (good and bad)/part or subdivision/fraction/one tenth (of certain units)/unit of length equivalent to 0.33 cm/minute (unit of time)/minute (angular measurement unit)/a point (in sports or games)/0.01 yuan (unit of money)
new shoot growing from cut branch or stump

sentences.english: After the tillering stage the biomass 15N tended towards stable.
sentences.chinese: 在分櫱期以後微生物固持態15N的變化趨於穩定。

sentences.english: Characteristics of tillering and earing of dry nursery seedlings (DNS) were investigated by contrast to the paddy nursery seedlings (PNS).
sentences.chinese: 以水育秧爲對照，研究了旱育秧大苗的分櫱成穗特點。

sentences.english: Sowing time had a great influence on the days of tillering to jointing, and single ridge to double ridges.
sentences.chinese: 播期對分櫱至拔節和單棱至二棱的天數影響較大。

sentences.english: The influence time is mainly in the tiller stage and the grouting stage.
sentences.chinese: 影響時期主要爲分櫱期和灌漿期。

sentences.english: It did good for increasing seeds yield. The key period which affected seeds yield was from tillering to jointing.
sentences.chinese: 分櫱期至拔節期是影響種子產量最關鍵時期。

sentences.english: With the reduce of density, the number and percentage of earbearing tillerincrease.
sentences.chinese: 隨密度降低，分櫱成穗數和分櫱成穗率都提高。

sentences.english: With the reduce of density, the number and percentage of earbearing tillerincrease.
sentences.chinese: 隨密度降低，分櫱成穗數和分櫱成穗率都提高。

sentences.english: The sowing date had greater influence on the duration from sowing to tillering.
sentences.chinese: 播期對播種至分櫱的天數影響較大。

sentences.english: Some physiologic indexes of Plant with different tillers were investigated.
sentences.chinese: 本文對不同分櫱的麥株做了幾項生理指標測定。

sentences.english: It has the factory geometry but with redistributed weight and lots of steering tiller.
sentences.chinese: 它的工廠幾何與再分配，但體重和大量的指導分櫱。

sentences.english: Seeding times showed the influence on the tillering dynamics of Liangyoupeiju to some extent.
sentences.chinese: 播種時期對兩優培九的分櫱動態影響大。

sentences.english: Lower concentration of CCC can promote the tillering, increase underground biomass and improve the turf uniformity.
sentences.chinese: 低濃度矮壯素能促進分櫱和地下生物量的積累。

sentences.english: The number of the cluster was linearly positive to the cluster diameter.
sentences.chinese: 分櫱叢的數量與叢徑之間有極顯著的直線正相關關係。

sentences.english: Coating treatment with the chemical could hasten the seedling tillows and promote the fresh weight of wheat seedlings.
sentences.chinese: 麥種包衣處理後能促進麥苗分櫱，提高百株鮮重。

sentences.english: Some wheats and ryes tiller freely.
sentences.chinese: 有些小麥和裸麥大量分櫱。

sentences.english: The number of tiller of rice genotype was investigated during the tillering period, and calculate the relative tillering rate.
sentences.chinese: 分櫱期調查水稻基因型的分櫱數，計算其相對分櫱率。
